html:
2026-0054
2026-01-30FINCanada Post Corporation ActOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide financial assistance to the Canada Post Corporation for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide financial assistance to the Canada Post Corporation for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026, to a maximum of $1.008 billion in order to enable it to meet its operating and income charges during this period.N/A
subject: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide financial assistance to the Canada Post Corporation for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide financial assistance to the Canada Post Corporation for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026, to a maximum of $1.008 billion in order to enable it to meet its operating and income charges during this period.
